name: LUMINA one
headline: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: A small speaker with big sound, a sleek design, and up to 18 hours of playtime.
quote: “LUMINA one is your perfect companion for beach days, park picnics or cozy nights”
Trustpilot author: J. Smith on LUMINA audio’s Trustpilot
